definition: hey!/(interjection used to attract attention or to express surprise or disapprobation)
(sentence-final particle expressing exhortation)/(syllable filler in a song)

sentences.english: Then I opened it and lo, the mist was a worm.
sentences.chinese: 然后我伸掌一看，哎哟，烟雾变成一个虫子。

sentences.english: Hey, you're a girl home how can be so rude?
sentences.chinese: 哎哟喂，你一个姑娘家家怎么可以这么粗鲁呢？

sentences.english: Decide if you're Tiger or Eeyore.
sentences.chinese: 决定自己是跳跳虎还是哎哟驴。

definition: (interjection of surprise, pain, annoyance etc)/Oh my!/Uh-oh!/Ah!/Ouch!
interjection of wonder, shock or admiration
interjection of surprise or pain/Oh/Ow/My goodness!
interjection of pain or surprise/also written 哎喲|哎哟
hey!/(interjection used to attract attention or to express surprise or disapprobation)
to shout/to bawl/to yell (to urge on an animal)/to hawk (one's wares)
Wow!/sound of child's crying/sound of vomiting
replaces 啊[a5] when following the vowel "u" or "ao"
(onom.) expressing admiration or surprise/sound of a laugh
to draw back the corners of one's mouth
sentence-final particle similar to 了[le5], but carrying a tone of approval
